channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: LCD, IPS, OLED, and Quantum Dots: All the Confusing Display Terms, Explained
item.description: Shopping for monitors can feel like swimming through alphabet soup. Learn what all these technical acronyms mean before you buy.

item.title: Warren Buffet’s Berkshire Hathaway sells half its Apple stock
item.description:
Warren Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway cut its Apple holding by around half, to $84.2 billion, according to an SEC filing. While Apple remains the firm’s largest stock holding by far, Buffett had already reduced its stake by 13 percent earlier this year, hinting that he didn’t mind selling “a little Apple” for tax reasons. Berkshire Hathaway […]

item.title: NASA Is ‘Evaluating All Options’ to Get the Boeing Starliner Crew Home
item.description: Eight weeks after the Starliner spacecraft launched, NASA is still looking for possible answers to its technical issues—including the possibility of SpaceX lending a hand.

item.title: Zuckerberg and Jensen show off their friendship, while an AI necklace covets yours
item.description:
A fireside chat between Jensen Huang and Mark Zuckerberg at SIGGRAPH 2024 took some unexpected turns. What started as a conversation about the capabilities of Nvidia GPUs and Zuckerberg’s vision of an AI chatbot future quickly became a more casual affair — including a swap of custom-made jackets, a rare F-bomb from the Meta CEO, […]

item.title: How to Control Android Auto or Apple CarPlay With Your Voice While Driving
item.description: Both smartphone platforms offer a number of ways to interact with your phone while keeping both hands on the wheel. Follow these tips to get the most out of in-car voice commands.

item.title: When a big company comes after a hot startup, it’s not a slam dunk decision to sell
item.description:
We spoke to Harness CEO and founder Jyoti Bansal about his previous company, which Cisco bought for $3.7 billion in 2017.

item.title: How to Stop Wildfire Smoke Damaging Your Health
item.description: Smoke from fires is linked to thousands of premature deaths every year, and is a growing health threat as widespread blazes becomes more common.

item.title: Trade My Spin is building a business around used Peloton equipment
item.description:
Trade My Spin has pieced together a logistics network capable of offering same or next day delivery in most major cities in the continental U.S.

item.title: The 49 Best Movies on Netflix Right Now (August 2024)
item.description: The Long Game, Leo, and Godzilla Minus One are just a few of the movies you should watch on Netflix this month.

item.title: Tesla Dojo: Elon Musk’s big plan to build an AI supercomputer, explained
item.description:
Dojo is Tesla’s custom-built supercomputer that’s designed to train its “Full Self-Driving” neural networks.
